
**Welcome!** This website provides several visualizations of COVID-19 vaccination progress in Canada based on data collected mainly from [COVID Canada](https://covid19tracker.ca/vaccinationtracker.html) and [Our World in Data](https://ourworldindata.org/covid-vaccinations). The latest federal distribution schedule is [available here](https://www.canada.ca/en/public-health/services/diseases/2019-novel-coronavirus-infection/prevention-risks/covid-19-vaccine-treatment/vaccine-rollout.html).
